title: British Indian War Department Pamphlet MCQ 3

content.prompt: Which of the following was the most direct outcome of the conflict between Great Britain and the Ottoman Empire referred to in the passage?

choices.label: India achieved independence from Great Britain.
The Bolshevik Revolution broke out in Russia.
Ottoman Turkey allied with Germany against Great Britain.

topic.text: 9.9: Continuity and Change in a Globalized World

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
